template.template: Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL
template.name: Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL
template.description:
Monitor HPE MSA storages. Tested with HP MSA 2040, HP MSA 2050
Version: 0.7 Min. script version: 0.7

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ping check
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} CPU Load
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card health

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Flash, Drive, Controller Health

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} flash card status
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Flash, Drive, Controller Health

item_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} IOPS
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} web interface status

trigger_prototype.name: Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) ping failed
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} redundancy status is {ITEM.VALUE}
CPU load on {#CONTROLLER.ID} too high: {ITEM.VALUE}
Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Flash card on Controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
Web interface on controller {#CONTROLLER.ID} ({#CONTROLLER.IP}) is down

discovery_rule.name: Disk groups discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA disk groups.

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current job
Disk group {#DG.ID} current job percent completion
Disk group {#DG.ID} health status

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Flash, Drive, Controller Health

item_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current owner
Disk group {#DG.ID} preferred owner
Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Flash, Drive, Controller Health

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL:msa.dg["{#DG.SN}","ow"].last()}<>{Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL:msa.dg["{#DG.SN}","owp"].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} current owner is not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Current disk group {#DG.ID} not preferred for this one.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL:msa.dg["{#DG.SN}","h"].max(#3)}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} health status in {ITEM.LASTVALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Disk group {#DG.ID} operational status in {ITEM.LASTVALUE} state.

discovery_rule.name: Physical drives discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery all HPE MSA physical disks.

item_prototype.name: Physical drive {#DISK.ID} current job
Physical drive {#DISK.ID} health status

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Flash, Drive, Controller Health

item_prototype.name: Physical drive {#DISK.ID} power on hours
Physical drive {#DISK.ID} temperature
Physical drive {#DISK.ID} temperature status

trigger_prototype.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Physical drive {#DISK.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} power on hours are too high: {ITEM.VALUE} hours
trigger_prototype.description: Physical drive {#DISK.ID} summary work hourse are too high. Maybe, you should replace it. Check device owner manual. Ack to close.

trigger_prototype.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} temperature is over critical threshold
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature is in critical state: {ITEM.VALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} temperature is over warning threshold
trigger_prototype.description: Physical drive {#DISK.ID} temperature too high: {ITEM.VALUE}

dependency.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} temperature is over critical threshold

trigger_prototype.name: Drive {#DISK.ID} temperature status in {ITEM.VALUE} state
trigger_prototype.description: Physical disk {#DISK.ID} temperature status is in {ITEM.VALUE} state

item_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status
item_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} health status

item_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status
item_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} with SN {#ENCLOSURE.SN} operational status

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Enclosure {#ENCLOSURE.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" health status

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" operational status

valuemap.name: HPE MSA Port, Power Supply, Fan Status

item_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} speed
item_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} in location "{#FAN.LOCATION}" rotation speed, rpm.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL:msa.fan["{#FAN.ID}","h"].max(#3)}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template HPE MSA for Zabbix 4.2 with SSL:msa.fan["{#FAN.ID}","s"].max(#3)}<>0
trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} operational status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed too low
trigger_prototype.description: Fan {#FAN.ID} rotation speed to low: {ITEM.VALUE}

item_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} with type {#POOL.TYPE} health status

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} current owner not preferred
trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} current owner not preferred for this pool.

trigger_prototype.name: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status is {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger_prototype.description: Pool {#POOL.ID} health status in {ITEM.VALUE} state.
